comment: vary low camera quality, ram showing 8gb but working as 4gb phone, screen resolution is vary low. also disappointing by Amazon because of when i want to return and apply for refund they giving a childish reason  no refund, no exchange with new one just harassment. so please request u all don't  purchase this model and also don't purchase online phone from amazon.the screen is truly bad Don't waist your money in this price you can buy Poco f1 8 gb 256 and Vivo series

don't buy this mobile west of money I'm buy this mobile already
Super camera and phone performance ultimately super I refer good gameing person's no slow mobile only all time run and battery super . And sound unbelievably Dolby Atmos sound

Go for it. Undoubtedly the best mobile of 2019 so far.Pros - 1. Camera - A+(Specially selfie camera with AI technology, where you will find features like face slim, nose slim, chin slim, 3D , bigger eyes and others. I bet you will like it, much better than Vivo)  2. Internal memory and Ram - A++  3. Build quality - A+  4. Battery - A+ (holding charge including heavy usage and game play till 2 days easily)  5. Charging - A+.Some says it doesn't support fast charging but it is neither a normal or slow charging. It's not a super fast charging but a good fast charging.  6. Sound - A++ in one word awesome. Sound comes as 3D surround sound type. Previously I used small speakers whenever I used to see movies on Amazon prime even in my iPhone. But now no need of speakers. Superb Dolby digital sound quality.Cons - Only the display quality but it is negligible.
